00020 #define __EXAMINETRIPS_H

00022 #include "sqlite3.h"
00023 
00024 /// Get the distance between these co-ordinates, in km
00025 double haversine_dist(double latA, double lonA, double latB, double lonB);
00026 
00027 /// How much petrol do we think was drunk this trip?
00028 double petrolusage(sqlite3 *db, int trip);
00029 
00030 /// Total length of this trip
00031 double tripdist(sqlite3 *db, int trip);
00032 
00033 /// Weighted median,mean of lat and lon for this trip
00034 int tripmeanmedian(sqlite3 *db, int trip, double *meanlat, double *meanlon,
00035     double *medianlat, double *medianlon);
